info.comment:
BoncingBox
by
Fun Games
------------
Controls
*arrow keys: move left, right, jump
*space: Item Jetpack
*Mouse: Other Items...
There is a cheat in the game! Maybe you find thatm one out! But if you use it, it can´t be a real score!
------------
Please Love it! I´ve really worked hard at the game with 50 levels. And comment! I hope you have great fun.
------------
info.author: -Scratcher-

scripts: Zeichne mit der MAUS eine Linie
Halte die LEERTASTE gedrückt, um mich zu fliegen
Nun kannst du einen Doppelsprung machen!
